19350.「ちょいと いいかい 兄さん？\n さっきから聞いてると 森の怒りを鎮めるのって:
Excuse me, brother? From what I've been
hearing, you're supposed to be the one to
quell the forest's anger, right, buddy?

19351.「ええ その通りです。\n この役目は <pc> ひとりに\n やってもらうこと:
Yes, that's right. This role will be done by
<pc> alone.

19352.「どういうことだよ！？\n モリナラのことは 協会全体の問題だろ？\n 全部 相:
What do you mean? What about Molinara? That's
the whole association's problem, isn't it?
Don't put it all on my partner!

19353.「おっしゃることは わかります。\n しかし こればかりは <pc>に\n 頼る:
I understand what you are saying. But you have
to rely on <pc> for this one.

19354.「今のモリナラ大森林は 危険すぎる。\n 精霊を身に宿す者以外が 入れば\n 犠:
The current Molinara Forest is too dangerous. If anyone other than those who possess the spirit enters the forest, it will only lead to
more victims.

19356.「ええい 仕方ねえっ！\n レーノスの野郎や ユウギリ嬢ちゃんは\n この手で:
Yes, we have no choice! I want to save Renosu
and Miss Yugiri with my own hands.

19357.「まあ 心配するこたぁねーよ。\n オレは いつでも 相棒といっしょだからな。\:
Well, don't worry. I'm always with my partner.
Just stay with me like you're on a big boat!

19358.「どうやら 精霊の試練を終えたようですね。\n では 妖精たちのポルカを 身につ:
It appears that you have completed the
Spirit's Trial. Now let's put the finishing
touches on your Brownie Boost.

19359.「万物に宿りし 精霊よ。\n 森の使いである 妖精たちのチカラを\n <pc>に:
O spirits who dwell in all things! Give to
<pc> the power of the fairies, the
messengers of the forest!

19360.「どうやら 精霊の試練を終えたようですね。\n ご苦労様でした。\n どうぞ こ:
It appears that you have completed Spirit's
Trial. Thank you for your efforts. Please,
take this.

19361.「これで 森の怒りを鎮めるための準備は\n ととのいました……。あなたは すぐに:
Now that everything is in place to appease the
wrath of the forest you should head
immediately to the Molinara branch.

19362.「おいおい。話が ちがうじゃねえか。\n 試練が終わったら 森の怒りを鎮める方法:
Hey, hey. That's not what we talked about. You
promised you'd teach me how to appease the
forest after the trials.

19363.「あせらないでください 精霊どの。\n すでに その方法は ポランパン支部長に\:
Don't be hasty, Spirit. I have already
informed the head of the Poranpan branch of
the method.

19365.「そんじゃ 相棒。ポランパンのいる\n モリナラ支部へ 急ぐとしようぜ！:
Well then, buddy. Let's hurry to the Molinara
branch where Poranpan is!

19366.「<pc>。モリナラの未来と 仲間の命\n あなたに託します。吉報を 待ってます:
<pc>. The future of Molinara and the
lives of my companions are in your hands. I
await your good news.
